articles.author: Ben Taub
articles.title: Why Do We Still Measure Distances In Feet And Other Body Parts? - IFLScience
articles.description: Maybe this explains why Americans refuse to accept the metric system.
articles.content: If youre confused as to why we have started measuring asteroids in giraffes, ferrets, and other wonderful units then we have no explanation for you. On the other hand, new research reveals that body … [+3272 chars]
